sources.title: Vengeance Valley
sources.description: A cattle baron takes in an orphaned boy and raises him, causing his own son to resent the boy. As they get older the resentment festers into hatred, and eventually the real son frames his stepbrother for fathering an illegitimate child that is actually his, seeing it as an opportunity to get his half-brother out of the way so he can have his father's empire all to himself.

sources.title: Vengeance Valley (1951) BURT LANCASTER
sources.description:
Stars: Burt Lancaster, Robert Walker, Sally Forrest
 Director: Richard Thorpe

 A cattle baron takes in an orphaned boy and raises him, causing his own son to resent the boy. As they get older the resentment festers into hatred, and eventually the real son frames his stepbrother for fathering an illegitimate child that is actually his, seeing it as an opportunity to get his half-brother out of the way so he can have his father's empire all to himself.

sources.title: Vengeance Valley (1951) Burt Lancaster, Robert Walker | Western Movie | Subtitles added!
sources.description:
The sons of a Colorado cattle baron, one biological and the other adopted, resent one another and fight for control of their father's cattle empire.

Original title: Vengeance Valley (1951)
Director: Richard Thorpe
Writers: Irving Ravetch, Luke Short
Actors: Burt Lancaster, Robert Walker, Joanne Dru & Sally Forrest
Genres: Drama, Western
Budget: $1,008,000
